##**<span style="color:blue">Services</span>**
***
- To Help find ideal rental properties
- To follow the rental agreement and perform all nessary tasks
- To respond timely maintenance, repair requests
- To help save utility bills via data analytics and machine learning if requested
- To help build connecting networks, people help people
- ...

Speed, cost and customer care are our top metrics in property management service. For renters we want you to save money, to enjoy peaceful living and be happy with everybody.  DeepCare utilizes lean and agile management frameworks, together with data analytics and machine learning state-of-the-art technologies, to reduce various kinds of wastes, improve service agility and flexibility, and strike the best interest balance between landlords and tenants.
